en: When the first car left , half an hour late , they asked me to pass on this protest because at least 15 Members were in the same hotel and will not be able to take part in the vote because of the transport delay .
trans: When the first car left half an hour late , they asked me to transmit this protest to you because there were at least 15 colleagues in the same hotel and unable to vote due to the delay in transport .
de: Als das erste Auto mit halbstündiger Verspätung abfuhr , baten sie mich , Ihnen diesen Protest zu übermitteln , da sich wenigstens 15 Kollegen in demselben Hotel befanden und aufgrund der Verspätung der Verkehrsmittel nicht an der Abstimmung teilnehmen können .

en: Mr Juncker , the floor is yours , to use as you see fit .
trans: Mr Juncker has the floor to answer as he sees fit .
de: Herr Juncker hat das Wort , um so zu antworten , wie er es für richtig hält .

en: Therefore I 'd like to ask all readers to maybe also pass this article on also to others , who might normally not read the column , but have interest in the stock exchange and its workings .
trans: With that in mind, I urge all readers to forward this article to people who might not normally read it, but who are interested in and understanding the stock market.
de: In diesem Sinne fordere ich alle Leser dazu auf , den Artikel auch an Leute weiterzuleiten , die ihn vielleicht normalerweise nicht lesen würden , die aber Interesse am Aktienmarkt und seinem Verständnis haben .

en: It is far away from everything and you have to pass through a rough neighborhood to get there from the metro .
trans: No standard for kitchen equipment & only tiny cups.Area : very poor and many building sites . On the map a metro seems nearby , reality : a train station of no use.Park nearby : badly taken care of .
de: No standard for kitchen equipment & only tiny cups.Area : very poor and many building sites . On the map a metro seems nearby , reality : a train station of no use.Park nearby : badly taken care of .

en: That is why we prefer to pass on your harmonica to the experts for the installation .
trans: That is why we are happy to forward your harmonica to the responsible specialists for installation.
de: Deshalb leiten wir Ihre Harmonika für den Einbau gerne an die zuständigen Fachleute weiter .

en: We do not pass on personal data to third parties .
trans: We do not forward any personal data to third parties.
de: Wir leiten keinerlei persönliche Daten an Dritte weiter .

en: Mr Desama , the floor is yours .
trans: Mr Desama has the floor.
de: Das Wort hat Herr Desama .

en: In a nutshell , the Parliament wanted to ensure that the programme would bring about a real change in the quality of life of the cities and their inhabitants long after the festivities themselves are over .
trans: In a word , Parliament sought to ensure that the event would contribute to a real change in the quality of life in the city and in the quality of life of the citizens living there , beyond the period of celebration .
de: Mit einem Wort : Das Parlament suchte zu gewährleisten , daß die Veranstaltung über den Zeitraum der Feierlichkeiten hinaus zu einer wirklichen Veränderung der städtischen Lebensqualität und der Lebensqualität der dort lebenden Bürger beiträgt .

en: We will not pass it on to third parties .
trans: We do not pass on your information to third parties.
de: Wir geben Deine Angaben nicht an Dritte weiter .

en: Yet you are checked onto the aircraft , you have to have a boarding pass with your name on it and the airline is responsible for checking that the name on the pass is yours .
trans: However , you will be screened before the flight , you will need a boarding pass with your name on it and it is the airline 's responsibility to ensure that the name on your passport is yours .
de: Dennoch werden Sie vor dem Flug kontrolliert , Sie benötigen eine Bordkarte mit Ihrem Namen , und das Luftfahrtunternehmen ist dafür verantwortlich , daß der Name auf Ihrem Paß auch wirklich Ihrer ist .

en: During the next twelve months Dr. Rainer Woska ( 59 ) , Senior Vice President “ Production and Production Methods ” , will gradually pass on his areas of responsibility to his designated successor Oliver Jung ( 48 ) , thus concluding the medium-term succession process .
trans: LuK GmbH & Co. oHG, a company of the Schaeffler Group, and the workshops of the Lebenshilfe (WdL) set new accents in their long-standing cooperation with another cooperation project.
de: Die LuK GmbH & Co. oHG , ein Unternehmen der Schaeffler Gruppe , und die Werkstätten der Lebenshilfe ( WdL ) setzen mit einem weiteren Kooperationsprojekt neue Akzente in ihrer langjährigen Zusammenarbeit .

en: And whether you decide to have a look around or not to go out , the hostel offers you to opt between some tempting alternatives : the roof terrace and its pool in summer or the Cosmo-Lounge with its fireplace in winter .
trans: The Museum Island is only 500 m away and the popular nightlife on Oranienburger Strasse and the Tacheles artists' forum are only 100 meters away.
de: Die Museumsinsel ist nur 500 m entfernt und zur beliebten Nightlife Oranienburger Strasse und zum Künstlerforum Tacheles sind es nur 100 Meter .

en: Members may be interested to know that the Reverend Owen is with us today in the public gallery .
trans: It may interest Members that the Reverend Owen is with us today and is in the visitors ' gallery .
de: Es mag die Abgeordneten vielleicht interessieren , dass Reverend Owen heute unter uns weilt und sich auf der Besuchertribüne aufhält .

en: While uncertainties remain regarding the CFSP , it is an easy way out to take refuge in neutrality , which has lost its meaning as a result of the changed political scenario in Europe and should be replaced by solidarity in favour of a common security policy .
trans: As long as there is a lack of clarity in the CFSP, it is easy to hide behind neutrality, which has lost its meaning due to the changed political landscape in Europe and should be replaced by solidarity for a common security policy.
de: Solange es bei der GASP Unschärfen gibt , ist es ein Leichtes , sich hinter der Neutralität zu verschanzen , die wegen der geänderten politischen Landschaft in Europa ihren Sinn verloren hat und von einer Solidarität für eine gemeinsame Sicherheitspolitik abgelöst werden sollte .

en: Only then did I say , ‘ please , not yet ! ’ This is where you must not confuse cause and effect !
trans: Only then did I say: "Please, not now! “ Please don’t misjudge cause and effect!
de: Erst dann habe ich gesagt : „ Bitte nicht jetzt ! “ Da sollte man Ursache und Wirkung bitte nicht verkennen !

en: “ In a nutshell , the argument is that the incompleteness of being which I have attributed to contemporary objects uniquely matches the structure of wanting by which I have characterized the self . ” [ 22 ] The Lacanian concept of a “ lack-in-being ” proves strangely pertinent when it comes to drafting a structural cartography of the relations of subjectivation in capitalist societies .
trans: The interest of modeling lies in raising awareness of all that allows a complex and mobile milieu to evolve , this milieu emerging from the interactions between bodies , places , images , ideas , energies and tools . From this perspective, intervention means creating a moving mirror with many facets, in which a subjectivity in motion is reflected – but it also means exposing oneself to the risks of the machine, which are the risks of being in society.
de: Das Interesse der Modellisierung besteht in der Steigerung des Bewusstseins all dessen , was ein komplexes und mobiles Milieu sich weiterentwickeln lässt , wobei dieses Milieu aus den Interaktionen zwischen Körpern , Orten , Bildern , Ideen , Energien und Werkzeugen entsteht . Aus dieser Perspektive bedeutet Intervention die Schöpfung eines beweglichen Spiegels mit vielen Facetten , in dem sich eine Subjektivität in Bewegung reflektiert – aber es bedeutet gleichzeitig , dass man sich den Risiken der Maschine aussetzt , welche die Risiken des In-Gesellschaft-Seins sind .

en: Of all the wonders that can be found in Majorca we offer you the chance to know the fascinating four aspects : the nature , Gastronomy , wine and the sea .
trans: Of all the wonders that can be found in Mallorka we offer you the chance to know ( know ) the fascinating four aspects : the nature , gastronomy , wine and the sea .
de: Aller Wunder , die in Mallorka gefunden werden können , bieten wir Ihnen die Chance an , die faszinierenden vier Aspekte zu wissen ( kennen ) : die Natur , Gastronomie , Wein und das Meer .

en: In Germany , we now have appropriate devices at all weather stations that collect the data and are able to pass on this up-to-date data very quickly to the people responsible at the airlines and also to pilots so that they can decide whether or not it is safe to fly .
trans: In Germany, all weather stations now have the appropriate devices that collect the data and can quickly pass on current data to those responsible at the airlines and also to the pilots, so that they can decide whether it is safe or not, whether they can fly or not Not .
de: In Deutschland hat man inzwischen bei allen Wetterstationen entsprechende Vorrichtungen , die die Daten sammeln und ganz schnell aktuelle Daten an die Verantwortlichen bei den Fluggesellschaften und auch an die Piloten weitergeben können , damit diese entscheiden , ob es sicher ist oder nicht , ob sie fliegen können oder nicht .

en: All of this , in any case , must not get out of hand to the extent that buildings on which excellent energy efficiency renovation work has been carried out stand empty because the rent rises exorbitantly .
trans: In any case, the whole thing must not degenerate to the point that buildings that have been renovated to be extremely energy-efficient are left empty because the rent is rising exorbitantly.
de: Das Ganze darf jedenfalls nicht dahingehend ausarten , dass großartig energieeffizient renovierte Gebäude leer stehen , weil die Miete exorbitant steigt .

en: After a first post on those related to the purchase and sale , the parking pass .
trans: After a first post related to the purchase and sale , pass the parking lot .

trans: I will of course forward all your comments to Vice - President Barrot .

de: Im Kartoffelstärkesektor erleben wir eine gut funktionierende GAP im Kleinen .

en: We are agreed that Europe should , in the long term , have a seat on it .
trans: We agree that Europe should have a seat in the long term.
de: Wir sind uns einig , dass Europa langfristig einen Sitz bekommen soll .

en: It would be good , where further measures are concerned , to persuade the Commission and Council to think outside the box .
trans: As far as further action is concerned , the Commission and the Council should be persuaded that unconventional ideas would make sense .
de: Was weitere Maßnahmen anbelangt , sollten Kommission und Rat davon überzeugt werden , dass unkonventionelle Ideen sinnvoll wären .

en: At Lindner , we know the way to your heart is through your stomach , and with our extensive Swiss gourmet breakfast , fine cuisine in the “ Bonne Fourchette ” and “ L ’ Ambiance ” ( wonderful terrace overlooking the River Aare ) and the “ Le Vieux Rivage ” hotel bar , we ’ re sure we ’ ll have you falling head over heels in no time !

de: Die Liebe zu einer Region auch . Entdecken , erleben und genießen Sie in unseren Restaurants mit allen Sinnen die Kreationen unserer Pure Swissness Küche .

en: We know , without a shadow of doubt , that the Mayas were the very first to savour all the precious qualities of chocolate around 600 A.D.
trans: But we know with certainty that around 600 AD. the Mayas , followed by the Aztecs , were the first to appreciate all the virtues of chocolate .
de: Mit Sicherheit wissen wir aber , dass um 600n.Chr. die Mayas , gefolgt von den Azteken , als erste alle Vorzüge der Schokolade zu schätzen wussten .
en_idiom: without a shadow of a doubt

en: In theory , you are already acting illegally , but we are saying : OK , that 's something of a legal vacuum , we 'll put up with it .
trans: Theoretically you are already acting illegally, but we say ok, that's a certain legal vacuum, we tolerate that.
de: Theoretisch handeln Sie bereits jetzt rechtwidrig , aber wir sagen ok , das ist ein gewisser rechtsfreier Raum , das tolerieren wir .

en: As you will see below , it is easy and quick to become a site member and we take the minimum of personal details from you .
trans: As you can see below , becoming a member of this site is very easy . We only need very little personal information from you.
de: Wie Sie weiter unten sehen , ist es sehr einfach , Mitglied dieser Seite zu werden . Wir benötigen dazu nur ganz wenige persönliche Informationen von Ihnen .

en: We pass on this report , to which social actors and associations have contributed a great deal , to the Commission , in the hope that despite the short time remaining before the end of this electoral term , it will find the time , Commissioner - you represent the whole Commission here today - to put together some initiatives , and give a clear signal , so that the next Parliament and the next Commission do not have to start again from scratch but have something solid to build on .
trans: We are forwarding this report, to which social actors and associations have contributed a large part, to the Commission in the hope that, despite the short time left until the end of this legislature, it will have the opportunity, Commissioner - you represent those here and today the whole Commission - to work out some initiatives and give a clear signal so that the next Parliament and the next Commission do not have to start all over again but already have a solid basis .
de: Wir geben diesen Bericht , zu dem die sozialen Akteure und Verbände einen Großteil beigetragen haben , an die Kommission weiter , in der Hoffnung , dass sie trotz der kurzen bis zum Ende dieser Wahlperiode verbleibenden Zeit die Gelegenheit hat , Herr Kommissar - Sie vertreten die hier und heute die gesamte Kommission - , um einige Initiativen zu erarbeiten und ein klares Signal zu geben , damit das nächste Parlament und die nächste Kommission nicht wieder von vorne anfangen müssen , sondern bereits eine solide Grundlage haben .

en: There are plenty of places here to go rafting and kayaking in and around Jaca in the Pyrenees .
trans: There are numerous places for rafting here.
de: Es gibt hier zahlreiche Orte zum Raften .

en: ‘ Mind over matter ' - this is hypnotherapy in a nutshell .

de: Die rechten Details zu finden , um ein cozy Gefühl in deinem Haus während der Feiertagjahreszeit zu verursachen kann ziemlich schwierig sein .

en: That says it in a nutshell .
trans: That says everything in a nutshell.
de: Damit ist alles kurz und bündig gesagt .

en: As an active wheelchair user you can now go to places you could only dream of , and enjoy a new feeling of freedom .
trans: As an active wheelchair user, you can benefit from unimagined mobility and thus from a new level of independence.
de: Profitieren Sie als aktiver Rollstuhlfahrer von einer ungeahnten Mobilität und damit von einer neuen Unabhängigkeit .

en: But it must be clear that Parliament confirms its commitment to the ad hoc procedure - by way of derogation from Article 14 of the Financial Regulation - which should take account of Parliament 's requests , irrespective of the category of the expenditure .
trans: However, it must be clear that Parliament stands by the ad hoc procedure - by removing Article 14 of the Financial Regulation - which should take into account Parliament's requests, regardless of the classification of expenditure.
de: Es muß jedoch klar sein , daß das Parlament zum Ad-hoc -Verfahren steht - durch Herausnahme von Artikel 14 der Haushaltsordnung - , das die Anträge des Parlaments unabhängig von der Ausgabenklassifizierung berücksichtigen müßte .

en: I recently decided to pull together a list of some of the best augmented reality apps I had seen over the last couple of years and thought I would post them here to share with the world .
trans: With augmented reality systems, the real world can be captured in mobile computers and provided with additional information.
de: Mit Augmented-Reality-Systemen lässt sich die reale Welt in Mobilcomputern erfassen und mit zusätzlichen Informationen versehen .

en: Have a seat in the friendly and luxurious setting and order a good meal .
trans: Here you dine in friendly and luxurious surroundings .
de: Hier speisen Sie in freundlicher und luxuriöser Umgebung .

en: What we can say , without a shadow of a doubt , is that the European Union is today the main provider of development aid , and this means that the European Commission delegates play a very important role when it comes to representing the Community institutions and , in particular , the Commission .
trans: However , we can say without fear of exaggeration that the European Union is today the largest donor of development aid and for this reason the European Commission delegates play a prominent role in representing the Community institutions , namely the Commission .
de: Jedoch können wir ohne Angst vor Übertreibung behaupten , dass die Europäische Union heute der größte Entwicklungshilfegeber ist , und aus diesem Grund spielen die Delegierten der Europäischen Kommission eine herausragende Rolle bei der Vertretung der Gemeinschaftsinstitutionen , namentlich der Kommission .
en_idiom: without a shadow of a doubt

en: In other games , such as the announced Galaxy on Fire 2 , you will be able to upload not just your current score , but entire saved games with all the information imaginable – but more on that later .
trans: In other mobile phone games, such as the announced Galaxy on Fire 2, you will of course not only be able to upload your current score, but even the entire score with all imaginable information - but more on that later.
de: In anderen Handygames , wie im angekündigten Galaxy on Fire 2 , werdet ihr natürlich nicht nur euren aktuellen Punktestand , sogar den gesamten Spielstand mit allen erdenklichen Informationen hochladen können – aber dazu später mehr .

en: It is interesting that you should now ask the former opposition to organise this , and I will certainly pass on the message .

de: Bezeichnenderweise fordern Sie nun die damalige Opposition auf , dies doch in Ordnung zu bringen , und ich werde die Botschaft auf jeden Fall weiterleiten .

en: Keeping one ’ s orientation in the township is not exactly easy and it doesn ’ t take much to get lost .
trans: It's not exactly easy to keep your bearings in the township, it's very easy to get lost.
de: Im Township die Orientierung zu behalten ist nicht gerade leicht , man verfährt sich sehr schnell .

en: Do you envision working in a multicultural environment and even across different continents ? Then , this two-year programme is truly your perfect chance to launch a successful career at EADS .

de: Sehen Sie sich selbst als echten Teamplayer , der durch herausragende Kommunikationsfähigkeit , Kreativität und Innovationskraft überzeugt ?

en: Such an agreement has to be clear enough for Parliament and the Council to know exactly where they stand in the difficult transitional period ahead .
trans: Such an agreement must be clear enough for Parliament and the Council to know exactly where they stand in the difficult transition period that lies ahead.
de: Eine derartige Übereinkunft muss klar genug für das Parlament und den Rat sein , um genau zu wissen , wo sie in der schwierigen vor uns liegenden Übergangsperiode stehen .

en: The rooms are comfortably furnished with care to fine details , making tourists feel as if they are at home and not just guests .
trans: The rooms are furnished with comfort and cared for in every detail so that the tourist does not feel like a guest but at home.
de: Die Zimmer sind mit Komfort eingerichtet und in jeder Einzelheit gepflegt , so dass sich der Tourist nicht als Gast sondern wie zu Hause fühlt .

en: And this is what the changed plus ultra of our day and age consists in , which no longer runs straight off into nowhere but which anywhere , like cancer forming metastases , puts out its feelers and forms networks .
trans: This is the changed plus ultra of the present, which no longer runs linearly into nowhere, but somewhere oncologically and metastatically tangles and networks.
de: Hierin besteht das veränderte plus ultra der Gegenwart , das nicht mehr linear ins Nirgendwo läuft , sondern sich im Irgendwo onkologisch und metastasierend verﬁlzt und vernetzt .

en: On the issue of climate change , Europe has proved beyond any shadow of a doubt that it can take action when it wants to .
trans: On the issue of climate change , Europe has shown beyond a shadow of a doubt that it is capable of taking action when it wants to .
de: In der Frage des Klimawandels hat Europa ohne den geringsten Zweifel bewiesen , dass es in der Lage ist , Maßnahmen zu ergreifen , wenn es möchte .
en_idiom: beyond a shadow of a doubt

en: We are sorry , however , that this is the last time we will be able to pass on our congratulations to Greece in the same circumstances .
trans: However , we regret that this will be the last time that we can convey our congratulations to Greece under these circumstances .
de: Wir bedauern jedoch , dass dies das letzte Mal ist , dass wir Griechenland unsere Glückwünsche unter diesen Umständen übermitteln können .

en: I believe it is only right to pass Mr Gemelli 's message on to them .
trans: I think it is only too justified to convey Mr Gemelli 's words to you .
de: Ich denke , es ist nur zu gerechtfertigt , ihnen Herrn Gemellis Worte zu übermitteln .

en: After all , I did have a seat in the parliament of my own country for twenty-two years . I should merely like to use the force of my conviction together with you , certainly , and if possible also with the negotiators and Mr Tsatsos and Mr Brok , to say to the States which are reluctant and more sensitive than others on this subject , ' Please pay careful attention before rejecting the application of qualified majority voting to proposals which the Commission has made in a reasonable manner.'
trans: I would simply like to use all my powers of persuasion with you , but also , if possible , with the negotiators and Mr Tsatsos and Mr Brok , to say to those States which are more reserved and sensitive than the others on this issue : " Think carefully before rejecting the extension of qualified majority voting to areas reasonably proposed by the Commission . "
de: Ich möchte einfach meine ganze Überzeugungskraft mit Ihnen , aber auch , wenn möglich , mit den Verhandlungsführern und Herrn Tsatsos und Herrn Brok aufwenden , um den Staaten , die in dieser Frage reservierter und empfindlicher sind als die anderen , sagen : " Überlegen Sie genau , ehe Sie die Ausdehnung der qualifizierten Mehrheit auf die von der Kommission in vernünftiger Weise vorgeschlagenen Bereiche ablehnen . "

en: The Committee on Women 's Rights and Equal Opportunities has , without any shadow of a doubt , recognised the primary competence of the Member States in safeguarding sexual and reproductive health and rights .
trans: The Committee on Women's Rights and Equal Opportunities has unequivocally recognized the primary responsibility of member countries in ensuring sexual and reproductive health and rights.
de: Der Ausschuss für die Rechte der Frau und Chancengleichheit hat unzweifelhaft die primäre Zuständigkeit der Mitgliedsländer bei der Sicherstellung der sexuellen und reproduktiven Gesundheit und Rechte anerkannt .
en_idiom: without a shadow of a doubt

en: In a nutshell , Florence means Machiavelli , and the rule of deceit .
trans: And , in short , Florence is Macchiavelli and the reign of lies .
de: Und , zusammengefaßt , ist Florenz Macchiavelli und die Herrschaft der Lüge .

en: We face a very clear choice in the coming months . Are we to go back to the way the world was run , or not run , in the nineteenth century - a world of rival national sovereignties and balances of power ?
trans: We must decide very clearly in the coming months: do we want to return to how the world was run - or not - in the 19th century, to a world of rival national suzerainty and balances of power?
de: Wir müssen in den kommenden Monaten ganz klar entscheiden : Wollen wir zurückkehren zu dem , wie die Welt im 19. Jahrhundert geführt - oder nicht geführt - wurde , zu einer Welt rivalisierender nationaler Oberherrschaften und Kräfteverhältnisse ?

en: In today 's prices , that quantity of silk costs about 600-800 Euros , which is a shocking amount all by itself , but even more so if you consider that in the 18th century , fabric in general was more expensive in relation to the overall income than it is today . By a rough estimate , a dozen silk shirts were about as expensive as four or five brand-new computers or a year 's rent for a 1KB apartment on the outskirts of Tokyo .
trans: Those who had a lot of money could afford
de: Wer viel Geld hatte , leistete sich evtl.

en: If I were a Russian gas salesman and a German buyer , I would not be able to rely on the security of supply , especially in the event that the gas pipeline is routed through Polish territory .
trans: If I were a Russian gas seller and a German buyer , I would not have confidence in the security of supply , especially if the gas pipeline goes through Polish territory .
de: Wenn ich russischer Gasverkäufer und deutscher Käufer wäre , dann hätte ich kein Vertrauen in die Versorgungssicherheit , insbesondere in dem Falle , dass die Gaspipeline über polnisches Gebiet geführt wird .

en: However , this audit should not be misused so that even more important EU documents are classed as ' working documents ' or ' annexes ' to close the door on the obligation for complete translation .
trans: However, this revision must not be misused to remove even more important EU documents than " Working Documents " or " Attachments " classified in order to circumvent the binding obligation for full translation via the back door .
de: Diese Revision darf jedoch nicht dazu missbraucht werden , noch mehr wichtige EU-Dokumente als " Arbeitsdokumente " oder " Anhänge " einzustufen , um damit über die Hintertür die bindende Verpflichtung zur vollständigen Übersetzung zu umgehen .

en: 4 And it came to pass that on the morrow , when the multitude was gathered together , behold , Nephi and his a brother whom he had raised from the b dead , whose name was Timothy , and also his son , whose name was Jonas , and also Mathoni , and Mathonihah , his brother , and Kumen , and Kumenonhi , and Jeremiah , and Shemnon , and Jonas , and Zedekiah , and Isaiah — now these were the c names of the d disciples whom Jesus had chosen — and it came to pass that they went forth and stood in the midst of the multitude .
trans: And it came to pass that when the crowd was gathered the next day, behold, Nephi went, and his brother, whom he had raised from the dead, whose name was Timothy, and also his son, whose name was Jonah, and also Matoni and his brother Matonihah, and Cumen, and Kumenonhi, and Jeremiah, and Shemnon, and Jonah, and Zedekiah, and Isaiah—but these are the names of the disciples whom Jesus had chosen—and it came to pass that they went and stood in the midst of the crowd.
de: 4 Und es begab sich : Als die Menge am nächsten Tag versammelt war , siehe , da gingen Nephi und sein Bruder , den er von den Toten erweckt hatte und dessen Name Timotheus war , und ebenso sein Sohn , dessen Name Jonas war , und auch Matoni und sein Bruder Matonihach und Kumen und Kumenonhi und Jeremia und Schemnon und Jonas und Zidkija und Jesaja — dies aber sind die Namen der Jünger , die Jesus erwählt hatte — und es begab sich : Sie gingen hin und standen inmitten der Menge .

en: The backside of the front legs is well feathered , the hind legs have ample feathering from croup to hocks . The tail is bushy .

de: Die Rückseite der Vorderläufe ist gut befedert , die Hinterläufe von der Kruppe bis zu den Sprunggelenken üppig behost , die Rute buschig behaart .

en: Pass dam locks on the way , and get to know the calm Rhine River in undisturbed nature .

de: Nach der Rundfahrt im Rheinfallbecken oder der prickelnden Fahrt und Aufstieg zum Felsen inmitten der herabstürzenden Wassermassen , gehören auch Staudamm-Überwindungen dazu .

en: " just to say I loved my horse Vulcan - he 's a star ! Swimming in the sea with our horses was an unforgettable experience : together with sliding down the sand dunes .
trans: Unfortunately we have to leave paradise today and return to Germany - it's very difficult for us.
de: Leider muessen wir heute das Paradies verlassen und nach Deutschland zurueckkehren – es faellt uns sehr schwer .

en: Clearly , as soon as I have some information in this regard , I will pass it on to you , as I have done in the past .
trans: Of course , as soon as I have any information about this , I will pass it on to you , as I have done in the past .

en: Please pass on our thanks and good wishes to Anna and Danny and thank you for helping us arrange such interesting tours .
trans: The tours were really very interesting.
de: Die Touren waren wirklich sehr interessant .

en: China must give guarantees , and must engage in a hard and uncompromising fight against illegal practices , otherwise the European Union will have to take serious measures and close the door on counterfeiting and unfair and unlawful competition .
trans: China must provide guarantees and crack down on illegal practices in a tough and uncompromising manner. Otherwise, the European Union must take serious action to put a stop to counterfeiting and illegal, unfair competition.
de: China muss Garantien geben und hart und kompromisslos gegen illegale Praktiken vorgehen . Andernfalls muss die Europäische Union ernsthafte Maßnahmen ergreifen und der Produktfälscherei sowie dem ungesetzlichen , unfairen Wettbewerb einen Riegel vorschieben .

en: Another important thing that this Conference needed to make clear was that one way of tackling the causes is through ' best governance ' , by the Government choosing a form of governance that gives its citizens the chance to become involved in the generation and sale of raw materials and in education .
trans: It was also important to make it clear at this conference that the causes can also be combated if there is best governance, if the government chooses a form in which its citizens may also have access to the raw materials that are mined and sold , and be involved in connection with the issue of training .
de: Wichtig war es , in dieser Konferenz auch deutlich zu machen , dass die Ursachen auch dadurch bekämpft werden können , dass best governance herrscht , dass die Regierung eine Form wählt , in der ihre Bürgerinnen und Bürger möglicherweise auch an den Rohstoffen , die gefördert und verkauft werden , und im Zusammenhang mit der Frage der Ausbildung beteiligt werden .

en: This volume is simply the best . And – even if you don ’ t like it – I hear “ Rammstein ” .
trans: You roll on the floor laughing.
de: Da kugelt man sich vor lachen auf dem Boden .

en: In case you have always wanted to meet the folks behind GTA : Berlin , this is your chance to commemorate this great day in a relaxing atmosphere .
trans: So if you've always wanted to get to know some of the people behind the development, this is the opportunity to celebrate the debut of GTA: Berlin in an open discussion in a relaxed atmosphere.
de: Wenn ihr also schon immer mal einige Beteiligte , die hinter der Entwicklung stehen , kennen lernen wolltet , ist dies die Möglichkeit , im offenen Gespräch in gemütlicher Atmosphäre den Einstand von GTA : Berlin zu begehen .

en: This joint debate will also pass on a heritage to the next European Parliament as it takes over from the current one .
trans: It is also a kind of legacy to the next European Council that will follow the current one.
de: Sie stellt auch eine Art Vermächtnis an den nächsten Europäischen Rat dar , der auf den gegenwärtigen folgen wird .

en: 'Swept twice keeps cleaner longer ' , they say back where I come from , but there is no clear and compelling logic to the way the Directive now - as I see it , unnecessarily - requires double the course content in many areas .
trans: At home they say: twice as much is better than one! But a compelling logic is not recognizable if a lot of content is now unnecessarily - as I see it - required twice in the directive.
de: Man sagt bei mir zu Hause : Doppelt gemoppelt hält besser ! Aber eine zwingende Logik ist nicht erkennbar , wenn bei der Richtlinie viele Inhalte nun unnötigerweise - so sehe ich das - doppelt eingefordert werden .

en: I can promise you , however , that I will pass on to her , word for word , the point that you have raised , and I hope that she will then react accordingly .
trans: I can promise you , however , that I will convey to her verbatim what you have just suggested , and I hope that she will react accordingly .
de: Ich kann Ihnen aber versprechen , daß ich ihr das , was Sie soeben angeregt haben , wortwörtlich übermitteln werde , und ich hoffe , daß sie dann auch entsprechend reagieren wird .

en: I would be pleased to hear what you intend to do about this .
trans: I would like to hear from you what you intend to do about it .
de: Ich würde gern von Ihnen hören , was Sie dagegen zu tun gedenken .

en: Use the weapons and everything else you have in your hand , to get out of this action-packed adventure .
trans: Use the gear you own and whatever you have on hand to win .
de: Benutzen Sie die Ausrüstung die Sie besitzen und alles was Sie zur Hand haben , um zu siegen .

en: It is a matter of regret that , amongst the requirements that have come to the fore , the EU is not creating a specific history course which would describe the various uprisings , wars and revolutions which have taken place on the continent of Europe as being often difficult periods in achieving the vision that some have held for fifty years .
trans: To my regret, no one is demanding that the EU set up a special history course detailing all the turmoil, wars and revolutions that have taken place on the European continent, many of which were painful stages on the way to the vision that some people had 50 years ago years had .
de: Zu meinem Bedauern erhebt niemand die Forderung , dass die EU einen speziellen Geschichtskurs einrichtet , der auf alle Wirren , Kriege und Revolutionen eingeht , die auf dem europäischen Kontinent stattgefunden haben und vielfach schmerzliche Etappen auf dem Wege zu der Vision darstellten , die manche Leute vor 50 Jahren hatten .

en: It is also too easy to take a shortcut by cancelling all these countries ' debts .
trans: It would also be too short-sighted to cancel all of these countries' debts.
de: Zu kurz gedacht wäre es auch , diesen Ländern alle Schulden zu streichen .

en: Our experience and know how allow us to be the only one worldwide to commit ourself in writing that at least 90 % of the implanted hair will grow .
